tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following organelles is the location of post-translation modifications to proteins?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Smooth ER
X) Golgi body
Y) Glyoxysome [gligh-ox-ih-sohm]
Z) Mitochondria
bonus_question: -   –  What is the process by which cells that have reached the end of their functional life span undergo programmed cell death?
